snippet: The U.S. must help homeowners lower their monthly payments.
abstract: Op-Ed article by professor Joseph E Stiglitz and economist Mark Zandi charges that the government must help the estimated 13.5 million Americans who are in danger of losing their homes; supports mass mortgage refinancing plan proposed by Sen Jeff Merkley of Oregon, which would allow underwater homeowners to refinance in order to lower their monthly payments or pay down their loans.

byline.original: By JOSEPH E. STIGLITZ and MARK ZANDI

lead_paragraph: The U.S. must help homeowners lower their monthly payments.

headline.print_headline: The One Housing Solution Left: Mass Mortgage Refinancing
